about:
Hello! I'm Ricardo Gamarra, a devoted husband, proud father, and seasoned full-stack software engineer with over 9 years of experience. My journey in the tech industry has been fueled by a passion for innovation and a commitment to personal and professional growth.

Specializing in Ruby on Rails, NodeJS, and React, I've honed my skills through hands-on experience and a dedication to continuous learning. Beyond my technical expertise, I believe in the power of collaboration and mentorship to drive success. That's why I've embraced teaching alongside my engineering work, sharing knowledge and insights with others in the field..
